meanings.sent1: The difunctional machine kept breaking down.
meanings.sent2: The difunctional light bulb flickered on and off.
meanings.sent3: The difunctional toaster only toasted one side of the bread.
meanings.sent4: Her difunctional phone battery died after just an hour.
meanings.sent5: The difunctional car engine sputtered and stalled on the highway.

meanings.definition: Having two different functions or purposes.
meanings.sent1: The difunctional tool could be used as both a hammer and a screwdriver.
meanings.sent2: The difunctional watch also functioned as a compass.
meanings.sent3: The difunctional pen doubled as a stylus for the tablet.
meanings.sent4: Her difunctional backpack had a hidden compartment for snacks.
meanings.sent5: The difunctional keychain had a built-in flashlight for emergencies.
